Hi, I'm MJ, a composer.
Inspired by the timeless beauty in K-Demon Hunters,
I created this video with a traditional Korean atmosphere â€”
filmed at a quiet tiled-roof house in Namsan, Seoul, accompanied by a historical-style piano melody.

The wind quietly drifts over the old walls,
and time settles silently upon the tiled roof.
A heart that once lingered still remains,
guarding today as if never forgotten.
And in that stillness, the past softly breathes again.

ğŸ•¯ï¸ A touch of Korean tradition, cinematic emotion,
and a brief moment of healing â€” I hope this brings gentle peace to your day.

ğŸ“Location: Mokmyeong Sambang, Namsan Hanok Village, Seoul
